mapper.select:
select
distinct
from CRM.FIN_OPB_FEEDETAIL
order by ${orderByClause}

select * from fin_opb_feedetail r inner join COM_PATIENTINFO cp on r.card_no=cp.card_no where cp.crmid = #{patientId} and r.hospital_id=cp.hospital_id and trans_type ='1' and cancel_flag='1' and rownum < 9 order by FEE_DATE desc
